bayStackStormControlMib.name: bayStackStormControlMib
bayStackStormControlMib.description: This MIB module is used for Storm Control configuration. The Storm Control feature prevents traffic on a LAN from being disrupted by a broadcast, multicast, or unicast storm on an interface.

bsStormControlPollValue.name: bsStormControlPollValue
bsStormControlPollValue.description: The polled value when a notification is generated.

bsStormControlTable.name: bsStormControlTable
bsStormControlTable.description: This table is used to configure storm control global settings.

bsStormControlEntry.name: bsStormControlEntry
bsStormControlEntry.description: An entry containing objects for controlling storm control settings.

bsStormControlEnabled.name: bsStormControlEnabled
bsStormControlEnabled.description: Indicates whether storm control is enabled for this instance.

bsStormControlLowWatermark.name: bsStormControlLowWatermark
bsStormControlLowWatermark.description: Low watermark for storm control of this instance. If the rate drops below this value after having risen above the high watermark, a single notification will be generated.

bsStormControlHighWatermark.name: bsStormControlHighWatermark
bsStormControlHighWatermark.description: High watermark for storm control of this instance. If the rate rises above this value, notifications will be generated at the rate give by the bsStormControlTrapInterval object.

bsStormControlPollInterval.name: bsStormControlPollInterval
bsStormControlPollInterval.description: The polling interval for checking the packet rate for storm control of this instance.

bsStormControlTrapInterval.name: bsStormControlTrapInterval
bsStormControlTrapInterval.description: The rate for sending storm control notifications, measured in a number of polling intervals.

bsStormControlActionType.name: bsStormControlActionType
bsStormControlActionType.description: Storm control action type for this instance.

bsStormControlIfTable.name: bsStormControlIfTable
bsStormControlIfTable.description: This table is used to control storm control settings per-interface.

bsStormControlIfEntry.name: bsStormControlIfEntry
bsStormControlIfEntry.description: An entry containing objects for controlling storm control settings for an interface.

bsStormControlIfIndex.name: bsStormControlIfIndex
bsStormControlIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the interface.

bsStormControlIfEnabled.name: bsStormControlIfEnabled
bsStormControlIfEnabled.description: Indicates whether storm control is enabled for this instance.

bsStormControlIfLowWatermark.name: bsStormControlIfLowWatermark
bsStormControlIfLowWatermark.description: Low watermark for storm control of this instance. If the rate drops below this value after having risen above the high watermark, a single notification will be generated.

bsStormControlIfHighWatermark.name: bsStormControlIfHighWatermark
bsStormControlIfHighWatermark.description: High watermark for storm control of this instance. If the rate rises above this value, notifications will be generated at the rate give by the bsStormControlTrapInterval object.

bsStormControlIfPollInterval.name: bsStormControlIfPollInterval
bsStormControlIfPollInterval.description: The polling interval for checking the packet rate for storm control of this instance.

bsStormControlIfTrapInterval.name: bsStormControlIfTrapInterval
bsStormControlIfTrapInterval.description: The rate for sending storm control notifications.

bsStormControlIfActionType.name: bsStormControlIfActionType
bsStormControlIfActionType.description: Storm control action type for this instance.

bsStormControlBelowLowWatermark.name: bsStormControlBelowLowWatermark
bsStormControlBelowLowWatermark.description: This notification is generated when the storm control packet type rate falls below the low watermark after having risen above the high watermark. It is generated only once when this occurs.

bsStormControlAboveHighWatermark.name: bsStormControlAboveHighWatermark
bsStormControlAboveHighWatermark.description: This notification is generated periodically as long as the storm control packet type rate remains above the high watermark.
